headline: Cadence Strengthens Analysis Portfolio With Hexagon D&E Unit Buyout
summary: CDNS is set to acquire Hexagon's Design & Engineering division for 2.7B euros, expanding its simulation and structural analysis portfolio.

headline: 2 Reasons to Like PTC (and 1 Not So Much)
summary: PTC’s 32.1% return over the past six months has outpaced the S&P 500 by 20.8%, and its stock price has climbed to $212.96 per share. This was partly due to its solid quarterly results, and the performance may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
